About this Server

Features this server offers.

Legendary Levels

NWNXEE feature that allows you to play from level 1 to 60! You take level 41-60 the same as you take level 1-40.

Custom Races and Subraces

100+ choices you can make an enjoy! Play unimaginable combinations of races, subraces, and classes into Epic and Legendary Levels.

Chat Commands

Custom Chat Command system similar to NWN 1.69 Simtools. Full rich feature library of commands to extend your gaming experience.

Custom Class, Feat, Spell Changes, UMD

Class, feat, spell, UMD changes to reflect 3.5 and 5th Edition rules to enhance your character.

Character Customization

Completely control and edit your appearance after creation! Edit your eyes, hair, skin color,and your equippable items. Craft scrolls, wands, rods or forge your own items in the Omega Forge.

Banking System

Full feature banking setup. Store all of your experience points, gold pieces, or items. Swap them between all your characters in your vault!

Development Team
